title: Bouncer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Bounce. You will roleblock all their visitors and learn their names.
- Once per game, at night you may control a player into visiting another, learning their role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all opposition to the Elites.

desc:
Post 4900
*Name? Income? Company? Ah, sorry, this is for special guests only.*
